package:
msfm3d 0.1version
This package subscribes to a robot pose and map (Octomap or Voxblox ESDF/TSDF) and outputs a frontie PointCloud, a goal pose, and a path to that pose.
Andrew B Mills
https://github.com/andrewbmills/marble-frontier Andrew B Mills
catkin roscpp rosconsole rostime roscpp_serialization octomap boost_system pcl_common pcl_io pcl_filters pcl_features pcl_kdtree pcl_segmentation
